Package fdmBoggle.game

Class Boggle

java.lang.Object
fdmBoggle.game.Boggle
public class Boggle
extends java.lang.Object
This object manages the game logic Is made to function both in tournament mode and game mode

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Boggle()
    Calls reset() Sets private field tournament mode to false
    Boggle​(boolean tournamentMode)
    Calls reset() - sets private field tournamentMode to entered parameter
    Boggle​(java.lang.String[][] board, boolean tournamentMode)
    Calls reset(String[][] board)

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean enterWord​(java.lang.String word)
    Used to enter a word - Returns true and increments score appropriately if word is valid score is incremented by 1 if length = 3-4, 2 if length = 5, 3 if length = 6, 5 if length = 7, 11 if length = 8 or higher Will return false if word is valid but has already been entered.
    java.lang.String[][] getBoard()
    Returns 4 * 4 2D String array representing board
    int getDefaultScore()
    Used in tournaments to get total score for 'Default player'
    long getDefaultTime()
    Used in tournaments to get time taken for the 'Default' player
    int getScore()
    returns current score from all entered words since last reset
    void printBoard()
    Prints 4 * 4 prepresentation of param board to the CLI
    void reset()
    Calls BoardGenerator and WordGetter to generate board and legalWords Sets score to 0 If field tournamentMode is set to true, this object will record the time taken by the WordGetter
    void reset​(java.lang.String[][] board)
    Sets param board to entered value Generates new set of legalWords for this entered board Resets score to 0
    void resetScoreAndGuesses()
    Sets param score to 0 and field guessedWords to an empty list Used to 'recycle' a game in tournament mode

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Boggle

      public Boggle()
      Calls reset() Sets private field tournament mode to false

    • Boggle

      public Boggle​(boolean tournamentMode)
      Calls reset() - sets private field tournamentMode to entered parameter
      Parameters:
      tournamentMode - - sets tournamentMode field

    • Boggle

      public Boggle​(java.lang.String[][] board, boolean tournamentMode) throws BoggleException
      Calls reset(String[][] board)
      Parameters:
      tournamentMode - - sets tounamentMode field
      board - - passed into reset(String[][] board)
      Throws:
      BoggleException - - if reset(String[][] board) throws this exception

  • Method Details

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Calls BoardGenerator and WordGetter to generate board and legalWords Sets score to 0 If field tournamentMode is set to true, this object will record the time taken by the WordGetter

    • reset

      public void reset​(java.lang.String[][] board) throws BoggleException
      Sets param board to entered value Generates new set of legalWords for this entered board Resets score to 0
      Parameters:
      board - - sets board field
      Throws:
      BoggleException - - if board is of incorrect dimensions

    • resetScoreAndGuesses

      public void resetScoreAndGuesses()
      Sets param score to 0 and field guessedWords to an empty list Used to 'recycle' a game in tournament mode

    • enterWord

      public boolean enterWord​(java.lang.String word)
      Used to enter a word - Returns true and increments score appropriately if word is valid score is incremented by 1 if length = 3-4, 2 if length = 5, 3 if length = 6, 5 if length = 7, 11 if length = 8 or higher Will return false if word is valid but has already been entered. Will not increment score If tournamentMode is enabled, it decrements score by 1 for incorrect words
      Parameters:
      word - - A string representing a word that can be constructed with the board
      Returns:
      true if word is valid and has not been entered before, otherwise returns false

    • getDefaultTime

      public long getDefaultTime()
      Used in tournaments to get time taken for the 'Default' player
      Returns:
      a long representing time in milliseconds for the WordGetter

    • getDefaultScore

      public int getDefaultScore()
      Used in tournaments to get total score for 'Default player'
      Returns:
      an int representing the total combined score of all legalWords present for this board

    • printBoard

      public void printBoard()
      Prints 4 * 4 prepresentation of param board to the CLI

    • getBoard

      public java.lang.String[][] getBoard()
      Returns 4 * 4 2D String array representing board
      Returns:
      board

    • getScore

      public int getScore()
      returns current score from all entered words since last reset
      Returns:
      score
